name: Baba Is You level editor beta
name_original: Baba Is You level editor beta
description: I wanted to allow people not on Steam to also be able to check out the beta version of the editor, and this was the solution. The editor will officially release in early 2021, and once that happens this editor will no longer be maintained. However, until then you can use it to try out the editor and upload your levels for others to play!
